testsuite.name: Tests.PayContactAddress

testcase.name: Pay_contact_Address_Scenario
testcase.system-out: ✅ Clicked on the 'Pay Contacts / Address' TextView. ✅ Clicked and entered contact name in the 'Enter Number / Name' EditText field. ⏱ Execution Time for clickEditTextField(): 5082 ms ✅ Successfully clicked on the specified contact ('Subbu Paycio, 6304869664'). ⏱ Execution Time for clickIfNameAppearsForContacts(): 2097 ms ✅ Entered amount: 10 ⏱ Execution Time for enterAmount(): 2874 ms ✅ Clicked on 'Bitcoin, BTC, Bitcoin Mainnet'. ⏱ Execution Time for clickBitcoinElement(): 1278 ms ✅ Successfully clicked on USDC checkbox. ⏱ Execution Time for clickUSDCElement(): 5961 ms ✅ Clicked on 'Confirm' button. ⏱ Execution Time for clickConfirmButton(): 1885 ms ✅ Pay Button Found. Clicking on it... ✅ Pay Button Clicked Successfully ⏱ Execution Time for clickOnPayButton(): 769 ms ✅ Successfully entered PIN: 2580 ✅ Clicked on 'Submit' button in UCPI page. ✅ Transaction Success Message Displayed: Transaction Successfull ⏱ Execution Time for verifyTransactionSuccess(): 8115 ms ✅Successfully clicked on the cancel button , ✅ Pressed the Android system Back button. ✅ Pressed the Android system Back button.
